title: Collaborative Human-AI Learning Scenario Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool competency and foundational understanding of social studies
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate with AI to perform social problem-solving projects, primarily engaging in group activities using digital devices (tablets/laptops).

learning_goals: Learners understand the fundamental operating principles of AI systems and can utilize collaborative interfaces.
Learners simulate the process of solving complex social issues (e.g., disaster response, resource allocation) through human-AI teamwork.
Learners self-assess and peer-assess collaboration effectiveness based on interaction records with AI.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
